name: City Survival (itch)
description:
City Survival is a City Simulation/tower defense game where you need to build houses for your villagers but if you don't have enough food for your villagers they will try to kill you City Hall you can build towers to help defend your city hall,

For the game jam Theme I left the mechanic of the towers shooting at enemies away instead they have life points and each attacking villager costs one life point of a tower
